chat.message:
Follow similar format to this ? 


https://ournh.northernhealth.ca/oursites/collaboration/ordersets/Documents/11-111-5003 Intensive Care Admission Orders-FF05569.pdf
Order as per previous comments of mine

chat.title: Break out into modules
chat.message:
Again, this needs to be broken into modules. The current ICU admission set has the following sections: 
  1. Admission information
  2. Activity
  3. Vitals
  4. Admission investigations
  5. Microbiology
  6. Daily investigations
  7. Sedation/analgesia
  8. Hemodynamic management
  9. Respiratory management
  11. Nutrition
  12. Glycemic control
  13. Anti-nausea meds
  14. Stress ulcer prophylaxis
  15. GU
  17. VTE prophylaxis
  18. Med reconciliation
  19. Other medications
There are pointers to each submodule (or separate ppo sheet in this case) for vasopressors, ventilation settings, etc.
